# Course Calendar

::: {.callout-important}

## This page is under construction. Trust nothing at this stage.

We aim to post most class materials for 431 in Fall 2024 before 2024-08-13.

Here are the scheduled class sessions for 431 in Fall 2024. All class sessions will be held from 1:00 to 2:15 PM in Room E321-323 on the third floor of the Robbins building at CWRU's School of Medicine.
